chart_description: This chart displays the client request read latency histogram in seconds for a Cassandra database cluster. It shows the distribution of read latencies with various percentiles, allowing users to monitor the performance of their read operations and detect any anomalies.

dimension_descriptions.p50: The median read latency value, which represents the value that separates the lower 50% from the upper 50% of the recorded latencies.
dimension_descriptions.p75: The 75th percentile of read latency values, which indicates the value below which 75% of the recorded latencies fall.
dimension_descriptions.p95: The 95th percentile of read latency values, which indicates the value below which 95% of the recorded latencies fall.
dimension_descriptions.p98: The 98th percentile of read latency values, which indicates the value below which 98% of the recorded latencies fall.
dimension_descriptions.p99: The 99th percentile of read latency values, which indicates the value below which 99% of the recorded latencies fall.
dimension_descriptions.p999: The 99.9th percentile of read latency values, which indicates the value below which 99.9% of the recorded latencies fall.
